# Government Tender Announcement ## Notice Type: Invitation to Qualify ### Reference Number: cb-4789-53490685 **Project Title:** Cape Breton Highlands National Park Trails Rehabilitation Project **Project Description:** The Parks Canada Agency is seeking a qualified contractor to supply all materials, equipment, labor, and transportation necessary to construct up to 20 km of hiking trails in Cape Breton Highlands National Park, near Ingonish, Nova Scotia. **Location:** Cape Breton Highlands National Park, near Ingonish, Nova Scotia, Canada **Currency:** CAD ### Project Overview The purpose of this project is to repair and replace trails damaged by flooding in November 2021. The project includes the construction of up to 20 km of hiking trail, divided into three trails and six segments. Successful bidders will have until March 31, 2025, to complete the work. Archaeology testing will be required before any construction activity that involves ground disturbance. ### Submission Instructions Bidders are required to submit a bid in two stages. This posting is the first stage, where all interested suppliers will be evaluated for their qualifications. The second stage will invite qualified suppliers to submit a financial bid on the project, based on the specifications and drawings. **Submission Method** Bidders must submit their bids by email attachment to the contracting authority at soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca. Only email attachments will be accepted; links to bid documents will not be accepted. The maximum email file size that Parks Canada can receive is 15 megabytes. **Evaluation Criteria** The evaluation criteria for this project are based on the qualifications of the bidder, including their experience, skills, and resources. **Timeline** The tender closing date is 2023-04-25T13:00:00. The expected contract start date and end date are not specified. **Contact Information** For further information, please contact the contracting authority at: Sheldon Lalonde Contracting Officer Email: [sheldon.lalonde@pc.gc.ca](mailto:sheldon.lalonde@pc.gc.ca) Phone: (343) 585-3836 Fax: 1-855-983-1808 Please note that all inquiries must be submitted in writing and received no later than five (5) business days prior to the tender closing date. **Late inquiries will not be accepted**.
